# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. After careful consideration, I believe we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us. I am offering the product to you for $1350000. This price reflects its exceptional quality and the value it will bring to you, while also ensuring a fair return for our company. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
